entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Calgary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -16.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 08:51 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -16.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -18.9°C
Wind: SSE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 5

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
